track.name: Rivers Of Babylon
comments: Yeah, great stuff! Didn't know the original. Thanks, LastFM for all the wonderfull music.
You mean this wasn't originally a Sublime song!? JK ;)
This is my baby son's lullaby
The fact that I saw the movie so long ago I can't remember when has everything to do with nothing at all.  "Let the words of our mouth and the meditation of our hearts be acceptable in your sight"
carry me away 2 very nice!!!!!!!!!!!how can 1 not love jah
The fact that I am tapping my feet and singing along has everything to do with this song...lol@Malkamillian and BlueOclock.
The fact that this sandwich I'm eating includes two slices of bread has nothing to do with the fact that I'm enjoying eating it! Hahahaha, anyhow, I really like this song!
the fact I'm high as a kite has nothing to do with the fact I'm really enjoying this.
we love you forever Papa Jah !
мне нравится этот кавер. это здорово!
Similar cadence to the classic "How Dry I Am"
Played this at my dad's funeral, as per his request.

How can we sing King Alpha song in a strange land.

Give thanks and praises to the most high. JAH RASTAFARI.
